name: Beneath our Scars
storyline:
Be ready for your serotonin and dopamine to rise with this fun and heartwarming love story!

Play as Melinda, a young optimistic gamer girl with a strong character, in long-term treatment at the Plum Blossom clinic. Meeting Rowan, a brand new patient who just arrived, will change your everyday life!

How far will your feelings lead you? Between games, chatting, and adventures,get to know and befriend one another all the way beneath your scars.
summary:
This game takes place in a private clinic and depicts the blooming love story between Melinda and Rowan.

Your choices matter and will allow you to build and help their relationship evolve. Make the best decisions to unlock illustrations during the story!
